publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-750 Brian Adam: Royal Society of Edinburgh and Links with Pakistan and India—That the Parliament welcomes the important role played by the Royal Society of Edinburgh (RSE) as Scotland’s National Academy of Science and Letters; recognises the contribution that the society makes within Scotland promoting the spread of knowledge and education; supports the activities of the RSE in building and maintaining links throughout the world, and, in this regard, congratulates the RSE on the links that it is building with the national academies of Pakistan and India by signing a memorandum of understanding with each academy.
S3M-750 Royal Society of Edinburgh and Links with Pakistan and India (lodged on 31 October 2007) Jamie Hepburn*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Stuart McMillan*, Sandra White*

S3M-750 Brian Adam: Royal Society of Edinburgh and Links with Pakistan and India—That the Parliament welcomes the important role played by the Royal Society of Edinburgh (RSE) as Scotland’s National Academy of Science and Letters; recognises the contribution that the society makes within Scotland promoting the spread of knowledge and education; supports the activities of the RSE in building and maintaining links throughout the world, and, in this regard, congratulates the RSE on the links that it is building with the national academies of Pakistan and India by signing a memorandum of understanding with each academy. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Joe FitzPatrick, Stuart McMillan, Sandra White, Bill Wilson*
S3M-750 Royal Society of Edinburgh and Links with Pakistan and India (lodged on 31 October 2007) Robin Harper*, Ken Macintosh*, Michael Matheson*, Murdo Fraser*
S3M-750 Royal Society of Edinburgh and Links with Pakistan and India (lodged on 31 October 2007) Elaine Murray*, Christine Grahame*, Paul Martin*
S3M-750 Royal Society of Edinburgh and Links with Pakistan and India (lodged on 31 October 2007) Hugh Henry*
S3M-750 Royal Society of Edinburgh and Links with Pakistan and India (lodged on 31 October 2007) Trish Godman*, Tom McCabe*
